text: The Wendigo is a novella by Algernon Blackwood. It was published in 1910. == References == * Joshi, S.T. Encyclopedia of the Vampire: The Living Dead in Myth, Legend, and Popular Culture, p.12, Greenwood, 2010. ISBN 978-0313378331 == Other websites == *The Wendigo (novella) at Project Gutenberg Category:Books
